mapper.select: SELECT M.NO , M.ID , M.PWD , M.NAME , M.EMAIL , M.PHONE , M.BIRTHDAY , M.BANK_NO , B.NAME AS BANK_NAME , M.ACCOUNT , M.ADDRESS , M.DEPT_NO , D.NAME AS DEPT_NAME , M.POSITION_NO , P.POSITION AS POSITION_NAME , M.AUTHORIZE_NO , A."LEVEL" AS AUTHORIZE_NAME , M.JOIN_DATE , M.MODIFY_DATE , M.RESIGNATION_YN , M.ENTRUST_NO FROM MEMBER M JOIN BANK B ON B.NO = M.BANK_NO JOIN POSITION P ON P.NO = M.POSITION_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.NO = M.DEPT_NO JOIN AUTHORIZE A ON A.NO = M.AUTHORIZE_NO WHERE M.ID = #{id} AND M.RESIGNATION_YN = 'N'
